summary: AN ORDINANCE granting to Ivar's Inc. (Ivar Haglund) permission to construct and maintain a pedestrian walkway and a covered patio including benches, tables, food preparation and serving areas, and outdoor lighting on the north side of Madison Street, west of Alaskan Way for a ten year term, renewable for two successive ten year terms, specifying the conditions under which this permission in granted and providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions.
